# typeIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The item’s Uniform Type Identifier (UTI).

## Declaration

```swift
optional var typeIdentifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Your extension must provide either the [doc://com.apple.fileprovider/documentation/FileProvider/NSFileProviderItemProtocol/typeIdentifier] or the [doc://com.apple.fileprovider/documentation/FileProvider/NSFileProviderItemProtocol/contentType] property. Use the [doc://com.apple.fileprovider/documentation/FileProvider/NSFileProviderItemProtocol/typeIdentifier] property only in iOS 13 or earlier.

## Providing Required Properties

- **itemIdentifier**: The item’s persistent identifier.
- **filename**: The item’s filename.
- **contentType**: The item’s Uniform Type Identifier (UTI).
- **capabilities**: The item’s capabilities.
title: typeIdentifier
